name: Credit Giants
title: Largest Net Domestic Credit
description: In 2022, Vietnam's net domestic credit reached an impressive 12,108,290,082,835,600 VND, showcasing its robust financial system.

name: Money Masters
title: Broad Money Supremacy
description: Vietnam's broad money supply hit a staggering 13,109,658,074,994,700 VND in 2022, indicating a strong monetary base.

name: Tax Efficiency Champs
title: Top Operational Efficiency in Tax Systems
description: With a score of 89.85 in 2024, Vietnam ranks high in the operational efficiency of its tax systems, reflecting streamlined tax processes.

name: Gender Equality Advocates
title: Strong Gender Equality Rating
description: Vietnam achieved a CPIA gender equality rating of 4.5 in 2015, highlighting its commitment to gender equality.

name: Export Powerhouse
title: Leading Export Capacity
description: In 2023, Vietnam's exports of goods and services amounted to 5,429,413,647,635,100 VND, underscoring its export strength.

name: Trade Balancers
title: Positive External Balance
description: Vietnam maintained a positive external balance on goods and services of 820,797,300,000,000 VND in 2023, reflecting a healthy trade surplus.

name: Import Capacity Leaders
title: High Export Capacity to Import
description: Vietnam's capacity to import, backed by its exports, reached 5,908,867,522,905,390 VND in 2023, demonstrating strong trade capabilities.

name: Income Receivers
title: Significant Net Secondary Income
description: In 2023, Vietnam received net secondary income transfers from abroad totaling 310,543,451,725,185 VND, boosting its economy.

name: Trade Terms Improvers
title: Positive Terms of Trade Adjustment
description: Vietnam's terms of trade adjustment stood at 479,453,875,270,286 VND in 2023, indicating favorable trade conditions.

name: GDP Discrepancy Watchers
title: Lowest GDP Expenditure Discrepancy
description: In 2023, Vietnam recorded a discrepancy in GDP expenditure estimates of -350,432,405,884,700 VND, highlighting areas for improvement.
